Write "" Write !,(##class(%CSP.Response).HyperEventBody()) Write !,"

Строки документа",! Write "",! Write !,"" Write !,!,"" Write !,!,"

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,!,"<script language=""Jscript"" src=""common.js"">" Write "</script>" Write !,"<script language=""JScript"">" Write !,"var Arguments=window.dialogArguments.split(InnerSplitter);",! Write "var DocID=Arguments[1];",! Write "var DocType=Arguments[2];",! Write "var ClassName=Arguments[0];",! Write !,"function load(){",! Write "PropTable.ClassName=ClassName;",! Write "TypDocument.innerText=DocType;",! Write "PropTable.DownLoadPairs("""",DocID,""Dat,Tim,Stat,Source,DocType,Summa,User1"");",! Write "docstr.ClassName=ClassName+""Items"";",! Write "docstr.LoadHeadersXML(""Doc,DocType,Price,Total"");",! Write "}",! Write !,"function loadgoods2(){",! Write "if(DocID!=""""){",! Write " docstr.loadfrommethod(""Docs.Action.GetStrFromDoc"",DocID,2,3);",! Write " }",! Write "}",! Write !,!,"function startFun(){",! Write "if(!window.confirm(""Сохранить?""))return;",! Write "var xmldoc=PropTable.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var xmldoc2=docstr.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var ok=SplitSendXml(DocID,ClassName,xmldoc,xmldoc2,"""_(%session.SessionId)_""");",! Write "//создатель документа вернёт его ID",! Write "if(isNaN(ok)){",! Write " alert(ok);",! Write " return",! Write "}",! Write " returnValue=1;",! Write " window.close();",! Write "}",! Write !,"function addtovars(){",! Write "WinResult=window.showModalDialog(""selectgoods2.csp"","""",""cener:yes;status:no;dialogHeight:700px;dialogWidth:800px;resizable:yes;"")",! Write "if(WinResult==null)return",! Write "WinResult=WinResult.split(StringSplitter)",! Write "var FieldCaption = new Array();",! Write "var FieldValue = new Array();",! Write "for(i=0 ; i<WinResult.length-1 ; i++){",! Write " var onestr=WinResult[i].split(InnerSplitter);",! Write " FieldCaption[""Goods""]=onestr[1];",! Write " FieldValue[""Goods""]=onestr[0];",! Write " docstr.AddRow(FieldCaption,FieldValue);",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write "//Goods, Address, Value",! Write "function ValidateAddress(RowArray2){",! Write "var Address=RowArray2[""addr""]",! Write "var Value=RowArray2[""Quantity""]",! Write "var Goods=RowArray2[""Goods""]",! Write "var ret="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Store.Action.validate:csp.docutiliz"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',Goods,Address,Value)",! Write "if(ret==1) return true;",! Write "return ret;",! Write "}",! Write "function curse(cur,RowArray2){",! Write "if((cur==""Client"")&(RowArray2[""addr""]!="""")){",! Write " alert(""Операция может проводиться либо на складе либо на клиенте"")",! Write " return false;}",! Write "if((RowArray2[""Client""]!="""")&(cur==""addr"")){",! Write " alert(""Операция может проводиться либо на складе либо на клиенте"")",! Write " return false;}",! Write "return true;",! Write "}",! Write !,"// закрытие окна с подтверждением",! Write "function windowclose(){",! Write "if(window.confirm(""Вы уверены?""))window.close();",! Write "}",! Write !,"</script>" Write !,(..HyperEventHead()) Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html XMLNS:SKLADz XMLNS:SKLAD2 XMLNS:SKLADList>" Write !,"<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADz"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/treeview.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLAD2"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/table.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADList"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/listview.htc"">",! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
